程序包 com.shapeville.game

类 CompoundShapeCalculation

java.lang.Object
com.shapeville.game.CompoundShapeCalculation
public class CompoundShapeCalculation extends Object
Manages the compound shape calculation exercises in the Shapeville application. This class handles the initialization, management, and evaluation of compound shape exercises, including both GUI and command-line interfaces. The class provides functionality for: - Initializing various compound shapes with their properties - Managing user progress through exercises - Evaluating user answers - Tracking practice attempts
从以下版本开始:
2024-05-01
版本:
1.0
作者:
Ye Jin, Jian Wang, Zijie Long, Tianyun Zhang, Xianzhi Dong

  • 构造器详细资料

    • CompoundShapeCalculation

      public CompoundShapeCalculation()
      Constructs a new CompoundShapeCalculation instance. Initializes the shapes list and practiced set.
      抛出:
      IllegalStateException - if no shapes are initialized

  • 方法详细资料

    • initializeShapes

      private List<CompoundShapeCalculation.CompoundShape> initializeShapes()
      Initializes the list of compound shapes with their properties.
      返回:
      A list of initialized compound shapes

    • getShapes

      public List<CompoundShapeCalculation.CompoundShape> getShapes()
      Gets the list of all compound shapes.
      返回:
      The list of compound shapes

    • getPracticed

      public Set<Integer> getPracticed()
      Gets the set of indices of practiced shapes.
      返回:
      The set of practiced shape indices

    • addPracticed

      public void addPracticed(int index)
      Adds a shape index to the set of practiced shapes.
      参数:
      index - The index of the practiced shape

    • isComplete

      public boolean isComplete()
      Checks if all shapes have been practiced.
      返回:
      true if all shapes have been practiced, false otherwise

    • checkAnswer

      public boolean checkAnswer(int shapeIndex, double answer)
      Checks if the provided answer is correct for the given shape.
      参数:
      shapeIndex - The index of the shape to check
      answer - The user's answer
      返回:
      true if the answer is within acceptable margin of error, false otherwise

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the practice progress, clearing all practiced shapes.

    • startCompoundShapeCalculation

      public List<Integer> startCompoundShapeCalculation()
      Starts the command-line interface for compound shape calculation practice.
      返回:
      A list of attempts taken for each completed shape
